name: Maggot in a Frying Pan
description:
This game was made for the GMC Demake-a-classic Jam, where the aim was to remake a jam game from GMC Jam 1 - 19.

I chose to remake "Maggot in a Frying Pan", a game by Dadio, where the aim is to slap a maggot with a chocolate bar as fast as you possibly can.
